title: Science Learning Leadership Development Program Utilizing Open Educational Resources (OER)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of science curricula and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Science learning projects using OER in a BYOD environment; learners strengthen self-directed leadership and collaboration through OER exploration, application, and adaptation

learning_goals: Learners must be able to explain the process of searching, evaluating, and applying science-related educational resources on OER platforms (e.g., OER Commons)
Learners must be able to reconstruct (modify/remix) OERs for science learning objectives and develop at least one hands-on material
Learners must perform leadership activities at least twice, sharing OER-based science learning experiences through collaboration with peer learners
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
